00039 #include <QtGui/QMainWindow>
00040 #include <QtGui/QMouseEvent>
00041 #include <QtCore/QPoint>
00042 
00043 namespace mimas {
00044 
00045 class Painter;
00046 
00055 class MainWindow : public QMainWindow, public ThreadedLuaObject {
00056   Q_OBJECT
00057   Q_PROPERTY(QString class READ cssClass)
00058 
00059 public:
00060   MainWindow() {
00061     setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
00062     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00063   }
00064 
00065   ~MainWindow() {
00066     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00067   }
00068 
00069   QString cssClass() const {
00070     return QString("main_window");
00071   }
00072 
00073   void testMenus(bool inplace, lua_State *L);
00074 
00075   // ============================================================ Dialog
00076   LuaStackSize getOpenFileName(const char *caption,
00077                           const char *base_dir,
00078                           const char *filter,
00079                           int options,
00080                           lua_State *L);
00081 
00082   LuaStackSize getExistingDirectory(const char *caption,
00083                           const char *base_dir,
00084                           int options,
00085                           lua_State *L);
00086 
00087   QSize size_hint_;
00088 protected:
00089   virtual void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00090 
00091   virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00092     click(event, MousePress);
00093   }
00094 
00095   virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00096     click(event, DoubleClick);
00097   }
00098 
00099   virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00100     click(event, MouseRelease);
00101   }
00102 
00103   virtual void paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event);
00104   virtual void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event);
00105 
00106   virtual void moveEvent(QMoveEvent * event) {
00107     lua_State *L = lua_;
00108 
00109     if (!pushLuaCallback("moved")) return;
00110     lua_pushnumber(L, event->pos().x());
00111     lua_pushnumber(L, event->pos().y());
00112     // <func> <self> <x> <y>
00113     luaDump(L, "moved");
00114     int status = lua_pcall(L, 3, 0, 0);
00115 
00116     if (status) {
00117       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'moved' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00118     }
00119   }
00120 
00121   virtual void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00122     keyboard(event, true);
00123   }
00124 
00125   virtual void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event) {
00126     keyboard(event, false);
00127   }
00128 
00129   virtual QSize sizeHint() const {
00130     return size_hint_;
00131   }
00132 
00133 private:
00134   void paint(Painter &p);
00135   void keyboard(QKeyEvent *event, bool isPressed);
00136   void click(QMouseEvent *event, int type);
00137 };
